SKU217245.Name: Dune Navy Sofa with Sunbrella ® Cushions
SKU217245.Description: Our urban style Dune lounge collection creates a modern "indoor room" that lives outdoors. The outdoor sofa's sleek outdoor-grade stainless steel frame is precisely mitered at the corners, welded, ground and buffed by hand to a seamless appearance, and upholstered in synthetic mesh.

Dimentions.productName: Dune Navy Sofa with Sunbrella ® Cushions

Features: Outdoor-grade stainless steel frame upholstered in synthetic mesh
Cushions are fade- and mildew-resistant Sunbrella acrylic
Contract grade tested for commercial spaces

SKU521834.Name: Kali Outdoor Aluminum Loveseat with Cushion
SKU521834.Description: Easy-going style with an industrial edge. Kali contours perforated metal into an outdoor loveseat sofa that's perfectly scaled for a balcony or small patio. Made of aluminum with a black powdercoat finish, the armless loveseat invites a comfortable stay with relaxing contours accented with a breezy punched pattern. A tailored, weather-resistant silver cushion hugs Kali's curves for an extra layer of comfort. Designed by Mark Daniel of Slate Design, the cushioned outdoor aluminum loveseat is a Crate and Barrel exclusive.

Dimentions.productName: Kali Outdoor Aluminum Loveseat with Cushion

Features: Designed by Mark Daniel of Slate Design
Cover or store indoors during extreme weather or off-season months
Foam cushion covered in weather-resistant 100% Sunbrella © acrylic
Clean chair with damp cloth; spot clean cushion

SKU262955.Name: Lounge II Petite Outdoor Slipcovered 83" Sofa
SKU262955.Description: The pile-on comfort and relaxed look of our popular Lounge II Petite sofa moves outside, defying expectations for how outdoor furniture can look and perform.

Dimentions.productName: Lounge II Petite Outdoor Slipcovered 83" Sofa

Features: Marine-grade hard plywood frame with galvanized hardware and waterproof, marine-grade glue
UV-, mold- and mildew-resistant webbing suspension
Cushions are mold- and mildew-resistant foam, encased in water-repellant sealed UV-resistant ticking
Vented opening between seat and back allows water to drain
Made in South Carolina, USA of domestic and imported materials
See product label or call customer service for additional details on product content

SKU484915.Description: Prop an iced drink on Walker's wide arms and sink back into its deep-seated and softly cushioned comfort. Dimentions.productName: Walker Outdoor Metal Sofa with Graphite Sunbrella ® Cushions

SKU450720.Description: Casual and stylish, our bench-style Alfresco sofa tricks the eye with the look of real wood and weathers the elements with water- and fade-resistant properties. SKU485572.Description: Cutting a clean, classic profile in the world's highest quality teak, our handcrafted Regatta outdoor sofa features a bold wide-slat design and a grey finish that emulates the silvery patina of weathered teak. SKU152287.Name: Scroll White Metal Outdoor Bench
SKU152287.Description: A staple of well-mannered gardens for decades, our update on white-coated iron lightens up outdoor spaces with modern curves and clean lines.
